entry.title: AI Is Making People ‘Question Their Own Reality’: Chelsea Manning
entry.summary: Manning highlighted the clash between humans and technology at Lisbon's Web Summit, questioning AI's rapid development.

entry.title: Emu Video and Emu Edit: Meta Debuts AI Models for Video and Images
entry.summary: The social giant’s latest tools can conjure stunning visuals from text, setting up a generative AI showdown.

entry.title: Snoop Dogg Says He's Done Smoking Weed. Crypto Degens Are Betting He Isn't
entry.summary: A new wager on Polymarket is offering crypto gamblers the chance to bet on whether iconic stoner Snoop Dogg will keep his word.

entry.title: FBI Arrests Three Men in Alleged $10 Million Crypto Laundering Scheme
entry.summary: The alleged scammers would create transactions and then claim they were unauthorized, converting bank refunds into crypto.

entry.title: Crypto Gaming Powers Up: Daily Active Wallets Hit a Million
entry.summary: DappRadar data shows growing blockchain gaming activity, but it arrives as more and more developers share how they're fighting off bots.

entry.title: Polygon Version of Bitcoin Ordinals Sends Gas Fees Skyrocketing
entry.summary: Before the drop, Polygon gas fees had increased 1,000% compared to the same time a day ago.

entry.title: Why Cathie Wood Is Bullish on Solana
entry.summary: "If you look at Ethereum it was faster and cheaper than Bitcoin in the day. Solana is faster and more cost-effective than Ethereum," Wood pointed out.

entry.title: How to Claim the Pyth Airdrop for Ethereum, Solana, Aptos Users
entry.summary: Users across 27 blockchains are eligible for the massive drop, which kicks off Monday.

entry.title: AI Brings ‘Great Promise and Great Risk' to Financial Markets: CFTC Commissioner
entry.summary: "Excessive reliance on a few AI models could lead to herd behavior," Christy Goldsmith warned today.

entry.title: Ubisoft Will Give Away Free Ethereum NFTs for 'Champions Tactics' Game
entry.summary: Assassin’s Creed maker Ubisoft says it will host a free Ethereum NFT mint for Champions Tactics, its upcoming game on Oasys.

entry.title: CBDCs Could Replace Cash in Global Finance, Says IMF
entry.summary: The IMF director is optimistic that CBDCs could replace cash in the global financial system—if central banks follow the org's handbook.

entry.title: Heatbit Founder Alex Busarov on the Bitcoin Miner That Heats Your Home
entry.summary: Decrypt joined Heatbit founder Alex Busarov at Web Summit for a walkthrough of the firm's flagship product, a Bitcoin miner that acts as a domestic space heater—aimed at the casual user.

entry.title: CoinShares Preps Move to US Market—Just in Time for a Bitcoin ETF
entry.summary: It's an auspicious time for CoinShares to be eyeing a foothold in the states, as anticipation builds for a spot Bitcoin ETF.

entry.title: Bazooka Tango Raises $5 Million to Revive 'Shardbound' as NFT Game
entry.summary: Game studio Bazooka Tango will use the funds to hire staff and bring the Immutable zkEVM game Shardbound closer to completion.

entry.title: Avalanche Pumps 14% After JP Morgan Adoption, Bitcoin's ORDI Pops 16%
entry.summary: Avalanche, Dogecoin, and Cardano have all made gains on Thursday, while BTC and ETH have slowed down their respective rallies.

entry.title: Solana Game 'Aurory' Expands With 'Seekers of Tokane' and Epic Games Store Launch
entry.summary: Aurory is launching Seekers of Tokane and plans to take it beyond the browser with a desktop version in the works for the Epic Games Store.

entry.title: Why BlackRock Considers Tether a Risk for Its Bitcoin ETF
entry.summary: "There is a risk that a disorderly de-pegging or a run on Tether or USDC could lead to dramatic market volatility," the firm writes.

entry.title: BlackRock Files Spot Ethereum ETF Application with SEC
entry.summary: Crypto exchange Coinbase will serve as custodian for the iShares Ethereum Trust, according to BlackRock's form S-1 filing with the SEC.

entry.title: South Korea's National Pension Service Invested $20M in Coinbase Shares in Q3
entry.summary: The national pension fund of South Korea has turned a 40% profit on its Q3 2023 purchase of Coinbase shares.

entry.title: Former VP Leaves Stability AI Over Copyright Concerns
entry.summary: Ed Newton-Rex resigned from Stability AI, contesting the company's assertion that using copyrighted content in AI training is "fair use."

entry.title: Irregular Sleep More Harmful Than Shorter Sleep Sessions, Study Suggests
entry.summary: Saying “I’ll sleep when I’m dead” is wrong in more ways than one, as better sleep is linked to greater longevity.

entry.title: Meet Maia and Cobalt, Microsoft's New Custom Chips Designed for AI Supremacy
entry.summary: Microsoft is shifting to an integrated strategy to grow both its AI and cloud computing portfolio.

entry.title: PancakeSwap Launches Crypto Gaming Hub—And You Can Earn CAKE
entry.summary: Multi-chain decentralized exchange (DEX) PancakeSwap is pushing into games, starting with a couple built around its CAKE token and NFTs.

entry.title: Soccer Giant Paris Saint-Germain Drops NFTs for Blvck Paris Fashion Collab
entry.summary: Prominent soccer club Paris Saint-Germain is offering fans early entry to its fashion collaboration with Blvck Paris via a Crypto.com NFT drop.

entry.title: Dairy Queen Is Doing an NFT Thing in China Apparently
entry.summary: The American fast food brand has partnered with NFT project Weirdo Ghost Gang for a pop-up experience in Chengdu, China.

entry.title: The Next Solar Storm Cycle Could Massively Disrupt the Internet
entry.summary: Researchers from two universities are sounding the alarm over solar activity that could disrupt most technologies, including blockchain.

entry.title: Gamers Hate 'Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III'—What Went Wrong?
entry.summary: Activision’s latest Call of Duty is getting slammed by critics and everyday gamers alike amid reports of rushed development.

entry.title: Regulators Are Powerless to Prevent Another FTX, Says CFTC Chairman
entry.summary: The CFTC isn't any better suited to stop a collapse like FTX today than it was a year ago, said commodities chief Rostin Behnam.

entry.title: SEC Needs More Time on Grayscale Ethereum Futures ETF
entry.summary: The SEC gave itself a deadline extention on the Grayscale Ethereum Futures ETF application.

entry.title: Symbiogenesis Preview: Everything You Need to Know About Square Enix's NFT Game
entry.summary: Final Fantasy maker Square Enix's first Ethereum game is called Symbiogenesis. From NFT characters to quests, here's what you need to know.

entry.title: ChatGPT Puts Paid Plan Signups on Pause as Systems Strain
entry.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said usage of its services has "exceeded our capacity."

entry.title: New Open Source AI Model from China Boasts Twice the Capacity of ChatGPT
entry.summary: The Yi series model takes a giant leap over its American competitors, at least by some metrics.

entry.title: Manny Pacquiao Turns to Shiba Inu to Help His Foundation
entry.summary: Manny Pacquaio's non-profit will use Shibarium for fundraising and operational activities.

entry.title: 'Wreck League' Preview: A Promising Fighting Game With Mechs and NFTs
entry.summary: PREVIEW: In early access, Wreck League already packs a punch—but high Ethereum fees may K.O. some players.

entry.title: JP Morgan’s Onyx Taps Avalanche for Tokenized Funds, AVAX Jumps 14%
entry.summary: JP Morgan's Onyx is using an Avalanche subnet to connect portfolios to tokenized assets offered by WisdomTree.

entry.title: Pat Felder - The worst is over [Macro Deep Dive Episode]
entry.summary:
Welcome to the first Markets Edition of This Time Will Be Different! In this episode we dive into the current macroeconomic conditions around crypto and look at the data behind the price action.
Reza sits down with Pat Felder, founder of Prismatic Capital to discuss the current macro environment, and to answer the question on everyone's mind-- is the bear market really over?

entry.title: Apple iPhone App Sideloading Could Increase Risk of Crypto Phishing Attacks
entry.summary: With Apple reportedly set to enable EU iPhone users to install apps from outside the App Store, crypto security firms warned of the risks of malware.

entry.title: Phantom Galaxies Game Guide
entry.summary: Head to the galactic frontier as the pilot of a transforming Starfighter in Blowfish Studios’ space-based battler. Here’s how to get started.

entry.title: The Sandbox Co-Founder Sebastien Borget: 'We're Already Integrating AI'
entry.summary: Decrypt sat down with The Sandbox co-founder Sebastien Borget at Web Summit to talk about AI, the open metaverse and the creative challenges of interoperability.

entry.title: Dacoco CEO Saro McKenna: How Alien Worlds is Creating an AI-Powered 'Lore DAO' with Kevin J Anderson
entry.summary: Decrypt joined Dacoco CEO Sarojini McKenna at Web Summit 2023 to talk about Alien Worlds' new Lore DAO and its AI-powered collaboration with sci-fi author Kevin J Anderson.

entry.title: Avalon's Jeffrey Butler on Designing a Metaverse MMO That Lets Players Co-Create
entry.summary: Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler speaks with Decrypt reporter Jason Nelson and details his studio's new MMO game with interoperable assets—and how it will enable players to create and monetize their own content.

entry.title: How Gen Z Is Different: OTK Chief Strategy Officer Talks Creator Economy Shift and Rise of Kick
entry.summary: One True King, an esports and gaming lifestyle brand and media company, was founded by creators like Asmongold and Mizkif. OTK's Chief Strategy Officer Zachary Diaz, who previously worked at TikTok and Twitch, shares with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the creator economy is changing.

entry.title: Moisés Zamora on Videomart and Bucking the Hollywood System
entry.summary: "Selena: The Series" creator and co-showrunner Moisés Zamora joins Decrypt's Sander Lutz at the Film3 Summit 2023 to discuss why the Hollywood system is broken and why he founded the Videomart NFT digital film marketplace to give creators more power.

entry.title: Why OTK Is Making Video Games
entry.summary: One True King (OTK) Chief Strategy Officer Zachary Diaz tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about OTK's long-term strategy and vision to become a content creator-powered media and video games company.

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: LoVid
entry.summary:
Artistic duo LoVid, aka Tali Hinkis and Kyle Lapidus, joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer burning questions about art, lettuce, and the hellscape (in someone’s opinion) that is Miami.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: Barney on DeFi, Privacy, and Vega
entry.summary:
This week our host is joined by Barney the founder of Vega Protocol.
They discuss the current state of DeFi, what's wrong with the apps being built today, whether or not privacy matters when its only applied to an L2, and most importantly-- which form of sales tax is the sexiest.

entry.title: Why Is Phantom Galaxies Releasing Two Versions of Its Game?
entry.summary: Animoca Brands-owned Blowfish Studios is building a space mech pilot game called Phantom Galaxies. Blowfish Cofounder Ben Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his plans for the game's release.

entry.title: Sophie Maxx on NFTs, Augmented Reality, and Fashion
entry.summary: This week our host is joined by Sophie Maxx (Web3Maxx) to discuss NFTs, augmented reality, the metaverse, how blockchain is sneaking into the fashion world, and more!

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Kevin Rose
entry.summary:
Kevin Rose, co-founder and CEO of PROOF and co-creator of the hit Moonbirds NFT collection, joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer some hard-hitting questions about his childhood dreams, his wife’s candy preferences, and his undying love of rap music.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: What Happened to Atari's Token? Inside Atari's Blockchain Plans
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Atari X director Tyler Drewitz about what happened with Atari's token plans, whether a token is coming, and what Atari games might be getting the blockchain treatment. Oh, and there's lots of Easter eggs.

entry.title: Twitch CEO Dan Clancy Is a 'Wild Card,' Says Marketing Director
entry.summary: Twitch Senior Director of Community Marketing Mary Kish speaks with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Twitch CEO Dan Clancy, Ninja, Twitch's new simulcasting rules, the biggest differences between Twitch and rival platform Kick, and the role of esports on the streaming platform.

entry.title: Why NFT Paris has Launched a Loyalty Token
entry.summary: NFT Paris founder Alexandre Tsydenkov told Decrypt what to expect from the upcoming 2024 edition of the conference, the launch of its loyalty token and its plans to create a Web3 loyalty program that rewards the most engaged members of the community.

entry.title: Game Review—Formula E: High Voltage Is a Fun Play-to-Earn Racer That Lacks Direction
entry.summary:
Formula E: High Voltage is a play-to-earn racing game with a distinctive strategic approach. Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin put Animoca's web-based game through its paces in this review, highlighting the unique gameplay design, the role of NFTs and crypto, and where the game currently comes up short.

entry.title: Amanda Cassatt on Web3 Marketing and the early days of Ethereum
entry.summary:
In this week's episode, our host is joined by Amanda Cassatt!
Amanda is the founder of Serotonin, a web3 marketing agency, the author of the first book ever published on web3 marketing, and led the marketing team that helped bring Ethereum to market.

entry.title: Midnight Society's Rob Bowling on Deadrop's New Cars and User-Generated Modes
entry.summary: Decrypt reporter and GG producer Kate Irwin interviews Midnight Society Studio Head Rob Bowling about Deadrop's development and Snapshot VII.

entry.title: Game Review: 'Raini: The Lords of Light' Brands Itself With Memes
entry.summary: Raini: Lords of Light is an NFT-optional card game bursting with crypto memes. From SBF to CZ and Elon, this free-to-play game has some truly wild animations. Decrypt contributor Ryan S. Gladwin shares his honest thoughts on the game.
